Channel 4 - Reporter Sam Kiley and producer Edward Watts travel to Central Africa&#039;s Great Lakes region to reveal that the same Hutu militias responsible for the Rwandan genocide in 1994 now control an area the size of Belgium in the Goma region of the Congo Calling themselves the Democratic Forces for the Liberation of Rwanda, the group&#039;s methods are still as brutal as ever and are being blamed for a pandemic of rape and pillage in the region.
